XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for all the tables in plugin totara_notification

TABLE.NAME: notifiable_event_queue
TABLE.COMMENT: A table to queue the events from system which is used to queue the notifications

FIELD.NAME: resolver_class_name
FIELD.COMMENT: The notifiable event resolver class name

FIELD.NAME: event_data
FIELD.COMMENT: A json string encoded of data. It contents the data describing what happened

FIELD.NAME: context_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The real context id component of the extended context of where the preference is defined

FIELD.NAME: component
FIELD.COMMENT: The component property of the extended context

FIELD.NAME: area
FIELD.COMMENT: The area property of the extended context

FIELD.NAME: item_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The item_id property of the extended context

TABLE.NAME: notification_queue
TABLE.COMMENT: A table to queue all the notifications to be sending out to the outputs

FIELD.NAME: event_data
FIELD.COMMENT: A json string encoded of data. It contents the data of the notifiable_event

FIELD.NAME: context_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The real context id component of the extended context of where the preference is defined

FIELD.NAME: component
FIELD.COMMENT: The component property of the extended context

FIELD.NAME: area
FIELD.COMMENT: The area property of the extended context

FIELD.NAME: item_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The item_id property of the extended context

TABLE.NAME: notification_preference
TABLE.COMMENT: A table to store the overridden of built-in and custom notification preferences

FIELD.NAME: ancestor_id
FIELD.COMMENT: This is to keep track of the original notification (built-in or custom) which is being overridden. Note that intermediate overrides may exist.

FIELD.NAME: resolver_class_name
FIELD.COMMENT: The notifiable event resolver class name

FIELD.NAME: notification_class_name
FIELD.COMMENT: The notification class name. If it is null, then it is a custom notification

FIELD.NAME: context_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The real context id component of the extended context of where the event occurred

FIELD.NAME: component
FIELD.COMMENT: The component property of the extended context

FIELD.NAME: area
FIELD.COMMENT: The area property of the extended context

FIELD.NAME: item_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The item_id property of the extended context

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: This is required for custom notifications, but should be null for notification override records. The overridden of custom does not have to have value.

FIELD.NAME: recipient
FIELD.COMMENT: If this is a custom notification then this is required, otherwise null to fallback to the default defined in built in notification

FIELD.NAME: subject
FIELD.COMMENT: If this is a custom notification then it is required, otherwise null to fallback to the default defined in ancestor notification

FIELD.NAME: subject_format
FIELD.COMMENT: If this is a custom notification then it is required, otherwise null to fallback to the default define in ancester notification

FIELD.NAME: body
FIELD.COMMENT: If this is a custom notification then it is required, otherwise null to fallback to the default defined in ancestor notification

FIELD.NAME: body_format
FIELD.COMMENT: The format text of a body

FIELD.NAME: schedule_offset
FIELD.COMMENT: Offset in seconds. Negative = before event, Positive = after event, 0 = on event. Null = inherit from parent.

FIELD.NAME: enabled
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the notification is enabled. If this is a custom notification then it is required, otherwise null to fallback to the default define in ancester notification

FIELD.NAME: forced_delivery_channels
FIELD.COMMENT: A json string of which channels had been forced, null to fallback to the default defined in ancestor notification, or represents nothing is forced for custom notification

TABLE.NAME: notifiable_event_preference
TABLE.COMMENT: A table stores the system's configurations of notifiable events

FIELD.NAME: component
FIELD.COMMENT: The component property of the extended context

FIELD.NAME: area
FIELD.COMMENT: The area property of the extended context

FIELD.NAME: item_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The item_id property of the extended context

FIELD.NAME: enabled
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether this notifiable event is enabled or not. If null, the default class value is used instead.

FIELD.NAME: default_delivery_channels
FIELD.COMMENT: A concatenated string of delivery channel components. If null, the defaults are used. If not null, only the named channels are enabled.
